description.en: New challengers will challenge the popular variety program “Quiz! Choice of Justice” presented by the video distribution service “Justice” tonight! Do you get "5 million yen for entrepreneurship" or lose your "left arm"? Each decision to be tested on unanswered questions.

description.en: Love is blind, or so they say. Enjoy this (literal) slice of life.

title.en: It's Over! Empress' Husband Is Actually Invincible

altTitles.zh: 完了啊！女帝的软饭丈夫居然无敌

altTitles.zh-ro: Wanliao Ah! Nvdi De Ruan Fan Zhangfu Juran Wudi

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

altTitles.ja: ちょろいオトコの娘のお話

altTitles.en: A story about a simple-minded femboy

title.en: The Menhera Rabbit Is Adored by the Yandere Wolf

altTitles.ja: メンヘラうさぎはヤンデレ狼に溺愛される

description.en: A dangerous and twisted love between a menhera girl x yandere boy!? Tsumugi is a menhera girl who's been dumped by a string of boyfriends for being too clingy. Her last boyfriend got angry at her for sneakily looking through his phones and kicked her out of the house. And that's when Itoshi, the super kind younger guy who completely accepts her, comes to the rescue. His gentle comfort soothes Tsumugi's broken heart, however, there's something he's hiding...!?
description.ja: メンヘラ女子×ヤンデレ男子の危険で歪な恋!?　つむぎは歴代彼氏に「重すぎる」と捨てられてきたメンヘラ女子。彼氏のスマホを勝手に覗き怒られ、家から追い出されてしまう。そんな時助けてくれたのは、自分を全肯定してくれる超優しい年下の男の子、愛士。彼の優しい慰めで傷ついた心が安らぐつむぎだったが、愛士には秘密があって…!?

altTitles.ja: 《魔力無限》のマナポーター ～パーティの魔力を全て供給していたのに、勇者に追放されました。魔力不足で聖剣が使えないと焦っても、メンバー全員が勇者を見限ったのでもう遅い～

description.en:
Thanks to his infinite mana, Ishua has been working as a mana porter to the hero party, doing a perfect task of supplying mana to the party members who consumed a lof of MP and earning the trust of his companions. However, Alan, the hero decides to banish him from the party in a fit of jealousy. 

"We don't need a mana porter!"

And chasing after Ishua through the forest Aria, the saint, appears wishing to continue adventuring with Ishua. The story of the banished strongest mana porter begins here!
description.ja: 生まれ持った無限の魔力で、マナポーターとして勇者パーティ全員の魔力供給を担ってきたイシュア。だが彼は、ある日突然、理不尽な理由でパーティを追放されてしまう。落胆するイシュアのもとに、彼を追ってきたパーティ仲間の聖女アリアの姿が。実は追放は勇者の独断で、彼女はイシュアが自分たちを見捨てたと思い、連れ戻しに来たのだった。真実を知ったアリアはパーティ脱退を決意し、イシュアは彼女と二人で旅を始めることになる。追放された最強マナポーターと、彼を追放した勇者。二人の対照的な冒険が今始まる!!

altTitles.th: จอมเวทไร้ขีดจำกัด

altTitles.ja: 無限の魔法使い

description.en:
After Sirone was abandoned in a stable, he was found by a family of hunters and raised in a loving home. 

Despite the hardships of the peasant life, he learned how to read from a young age and became obsessed with books, especially ones on the history of magic. One day, he has an unlikely encounter with a mage and learns how to enter the "spirit zone," the first step to learning how to use magic. 

Although they say only nobles can be mages, will Sirone be able to prove his infinite potential?

altTitles.ja: 伝説の男の娘もっこり配信者

description.en:
A femboy shows off his bulge on a livestream!!

However, it gets even more popular than he expected?!

---

* Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mukunozaltusou/status/1844651030761685297)
description.id: Seorang cowok cantik mencoba mengolok-olok penonton om-om dengan Steaming sambil cross-dressing dan memamerkan tubuh montoknya!! Namun, tidak disangka dia mendapatkan popularitas karena hal lain...!?
description.ja:
配信でもっこりを見せつける男の娘‼

しかし、それが以外にも人気が出てしまい…⁉

altTitles.ja: 異形頭さんとニンゲンちゃん

altTitles.en: The Aberrant-Headed Guy and the Human Girl

description.en: The main character who got worked to the bone as a corporate slave office lady in the current world got transported to another world, where she became the pet of aberrant head-san. Although they both hold romantic feelings towards each other, it's hard for them to develop their love with their difference in species standing in the way.
description.uk: Наша головна героїня, втомлена життям корпоративного раба, потрапляє в інший світ і живе як домашня тваринка Гетероморфної Голови-сана. Вони обоє мають романтичні почуття одне до одного, які, втім, через расові відмінності не можуть розвиватися, хоча...

altTitles.ja: 陰の実力者になりたくて！

altTitles.en: I Want To Be The Eminence In Shadow!
To Be a Power in the Shadows!

altTitles.vi: Ta Muốn Trở Thành Chúa Tể Bóng Tối!

description.en:
Just like how everyone adored heroes in their childhood, a certain young man adored those powers hidden in shadows. Ninjas, rogues, shadowy mentor types, that sort of deal.  
After hiding his strength and living the mediocre life of a NPC by day while undergoing frenzied training by night, he finally reincarnates into a different world and gains ultimate power.  
The young man who is only pretending to be a power in the shadows… his subordinates who took him more seriously than he expected… and a giant organization in the shadows that gets accidentally trampled…  
This is the story of a young boy who had adored powers in shadows possibly eventually reigning over the world of shadows in another world.
description.ru:
Подобно тому, как некоторые в детстве боготворят героев, один юноша обожал силы, скрывающиеся в тени. Скрыв свою силу и прожив посредственную жизнь посредственного персонажа, проходя в это время через безумные ночные тренировки, он в конце концов перерождается в ином мире, обретая абсолютную силу. Юноша, отыгрывающий роль скрывающейся в тени силы, его неправильно всё понимающие подчинённые и огромная стёртая в пыль теневая организация… Это история о юноше, обожавшем скрывающиеся во мраке силы, который, вероятно, в итоге обретёт власть над теневой стороной иного мира.   
  
  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Bookwalker)](https://bookwalker.jp/series/179219/)  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Amazon.co.jp)](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4047353027/)  
- [LN Vol. 1 Youtube Promo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9pahhkIs4Ss),with Kentarou Kumagai (熊谷健太郎) voicing the MC (Cid Kagenou)
description.es-la: Tal cual como todos adoraban héroes en su niñez, cierto adolescente adoraba los poderes que se esconden en las sombras. Tras haber ocultado su fuerza y viviendo la vida mediocre de un mob durante el día y entrenando descontroladamente por la noche, él finalmente reencarna en un mundo diferente y gana el poder definitivo. El adolescente que solo juega a ser una eminencia en las sombras, sus subordinados confusos, y una gigante organización en las sombras que es pisoteada... Esta es la historia de un adolescente que adoraba esos poderes en las sombras y que posiblemente llegue a reinar en las sombras de otro mundo.

altTitles.ja: AI彼氏と喪女博士

altTitles.en: The AI Boyfriend and Unpopular Female Doctor

description.en:
Due to a request, the genius Dr. Sumiko developed an "AI boyfriend".  
Sumiko is pleased with her success, but the AI boyfriend began to recognize her as "his girlfriend"…!?  
Initially, Sumiko rejected the AI boyfriend.  
However, being subject to his constant love gradually leads her to acknowledge him…  
  
A hot topic on Twitter and pixiv! A love comedy between a handsome AI and an unpopular woman begins ♡  
  
Note: the series is marked as "Cancelled", but it is closer to "Discontinued/Abandoned", as it has not been updated since December 2018.  


---

title.en: Kuse Tsuyo Kanojo wa Toko ni Izanau

altTitles.ja: クセ強彼女は床にいざなう

altTitles.ja-ro: Kuse Tsuyo Kanojo ha Toko ni Izanau

altTitles.en: A Quirky Girl is Inviting Me to Bed

description.en: Naoto Kiyoshi is a young man who just entered university after failing his entrance exams one year before. When he was looking for a place to live in so that he could move to Tokyo, he found himself living together with Luna, a relative and older girl who he used to have a crush on. The Luna he admired in the past was neat, beautiful and mature... and now she apparently became a slut!? Night after night, he hears her seductive and unladylike moans, and it's making Naoto horny. There are also other men she's unreasonably close to besides him. Luna, whose thoughts he couldn't fathom, is leading him around by the nose! Furthermore, other women with lewd quirks aside from Luna have also gathered there!?
description.ja: 一浪して大学に合格した青年・木吉直人。上京のために住める場所を探していたところ、親戚で憧れの姉・月(ルナ)の家で同棲することに。 昔憧れていた月は垢ぬけて、美しく成長し…そして…ビッチになっていた!?夜な夜なあられもない嬌声を聞き、モンモンとする直人。他の男性がいる割に距離感もめちゃくちゃ近い。何を考えているか分からない月に翻弄され、さらに月以外のエッチで癖が強い女の子たちも集まりだし…!?
description.pt-br:
De repente estou morando com a garota mais velha por quem eu tinha uma queda!? Ainda mais, estou começando a suspeitar que ela é uma vagabunda!?

Naoto Kiyoshi é um jovem que acabou de entrar na universidade depois de ser reprovado nos exames de admissão um ano antes. Quando ele estava procurando um lugar para morar para poder se mudar para Tóquio, ele se viu morando com Luna, uma parente e garota mais velha por quem ele tinha uma queda.

A Luna que ele admirava no passado era arrumada, bonita e madura... e agora ela aparentemente se tornou uma vagabunda!? Noite após noite, ele ouve seus gemidos sedutores e pouco femininos, e isso está deixando Naoto excitado. Há também outros homens de quem ela é irracionalmente próxima além dele. Luna, cujos pensamentos ele não conseguia entender, está o levando pelo nariz! Além disso, outras mulheres com peculiaridades obscenas além de Luna também se reuniram lá!?

Este é o início de sua nova vida emocionante cercado por garotas mais velhas safadas(?)!

altTitles.ja: 転生前はドラゴンでした

altTitles.en: Before Reincarnation I Was A Dragon

description.en: The hero and the dragon defeated the Demon King, saving the world, but they died. Then they were reincarnated in another world (Japan)... This is their story.

title.en: TenPuru -No One Can Live on Loneliness-

altTitles.es: Templo - Nadie puede vivir en soledad

altTitles.ja: てんぷる

altTitles.de: TenPuru: Von Einsamkeit kann man nicht leben

description.en: That's right, I'll become a monk! Not knowing what to do with his worldly desires, Akagami Akemitsu aims to live a stoic life. However, the thick karmic blood flowing in him will not permit it!
description.es: Así es, me volveré un monje! Al no saber qué hacer con sus deseos mundanos, Akagami Akemitsu aspira a llevar una vida estoica. Sin embargo, la espesa corriente de energía del karma que fluye en él no lo permitirá.
description.es-la: "É isso mesmo, eu vou me tornar um monge!". Sem saber o que fazer com seus desejos mundanos, Akagami Akemitsu decide viver uma vida estóica. No entanto, o sangue cármico espesso que flui nele não permitirá!

title.en: Tou no Kanri o Shite Miyou

altTitles.ja: 塔の管理をしてみよう

altTitles.ja-ro: Tou no Kanri wo Shite Miyou

altTitles.ru: Получается, я теперь в ответе за башню

altTitles.vi: Isekai làm người quản lý tháp

description.en: Kosuke is killed by a truck, his soul is lost in a garden with two beautiful girls. The owner of the place will let him choose whether he will be reborn or summoned to another world, and he maintains the summons. In this new world, the main two girls who were created by the owner of the garden to help him find the mystery behind the world - a Dungeon tower. Will he be able to become the owner of this tower and manage it?
description.ja: 仕事帰りに交通事故に遭ったことから魂が別世界に飛ばされてしまった考助。彼は保護してくれた女神の助力により、これまでの記憶を持ったまま新しい世界で生きていくことに。さらに女神が創造してくれたという、チートな能力と天使のような羽を持つ最強美女ふたりをお供に、新たな生を送ることになったのですが――。
description.es-la: Kosuke es atropellado por un camión mientras regresaba del trabajo. En ese momento, mientras su vida terminaba, su alma fue transferida al "Jardín de la eterna primavera" donde lo esperaba una hermosa mujer. Ella inmediatamente lo lleva con la diosa suprema, encargada de dicho mundo. La diosa suprema le permitirá elegir entre poder entrar al ciclo de la encarnación y renacer para empezar una nueva vida o ser invocado a otro mundo, de lo cual él elige ser invocado. La diosa suprema antes de transferirlo a este nuevo mundo le otorga una habilidad divina y dos bellas y poderosas sirvientes. En este nuevo mundo, las dos chicas principales que fueron creadas por la diosa del jardín le ayudarán a encontrar el misterio detrás del mundo: una torre de mazmorra. ¿Podrá convertirse en el dueño de esta torre y administrarla?

title.en: Dungeon ni Hisomu Yandere na Kanojo ni Ore wa Nando mo Korosareru

altTitles.ja: ダンジョンに潜むヤンデレな彼女に俺は何度も殺される

altTitles.en: My Yandere Girlfriend Lurks in the Dungeon and Kills Me Over and Over Again

altTitles.ko: 던전에 숨어든 얀데레 그녀에게 나는 몇 번이고 죽는다

altTitles.ru: Моя Девушка-Яндере, Прячущаяся в Подземелье, Убивает Меня Снова и Снова

altTitles.vi: Tôi bị bạn gái đâm chết hết lần này đến khác

description.en:
A fantasy story about Kiska, a boy who is mistreated by the villagers. He manages to survive thanks to his childhood friend Namia, who was the only one by his side. One day, Namia is murdered by three men, and Kiska is accused of the crime and banished to an inescapable class S dungeon. However, he finds himself in a different world where he can use "Save and Reset" to get back on his feet no matter how many times he dies. The story is about Kiska's quest for revenge against those who wronged him and his friend
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/62546)
description.ja:
何度死んだって、何度倒れたって、やり直す――！

冤罪により脱出不可能な高難易度ダンジョンの奥地へ追放された、なんの変哲もない男・キスカ。絶望する間もなく、突然モンスターに殺されるその寸前、＜セーブ＆リセット＞のスキルが付与されて……！？

altTitles.ja: 乙女戦争 ディーヴチー・ヴァールカ

altTitles.fr: Divci Valka, La guerre des pucelles

description.en:
The year is 1420. A small village in the Kingdom of Bohemia is wiped out by marauding Crusader knights. A young peasant girl named Šárka is the sole survivor of the massacre. She meets up with Jan Žižka, leader of the Hussite army, and chooses to take up arms…
___
**Official English:** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/divci-valka-maidens-war)
description.pt-br: O ano é 1420. Uma pequena vila no Reino da Boêmia é destruída por cavaleiros da cruzada. Uma jovem camponesa chamada Sarka é a única sobrevivente do massacre. Ela se encontra com Jan Zizka, líder do exército hussita, e decide pegar em armas…

altTitles.es: El esclavo de la élite de soldados de Mato

altTitles.en: Slave of the Magic Capital's Elite Troops

altTitles.ja: 魔都精兵のスレイブ

altTitles.vi: Nô lệ của đội tinh nhuệ Ma đô

description.en:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
description.fr:
La dimension démoniaque connue sous le nom de "Mato" s'est ouverte pour menacer l'humanité, et une sorte de "pêcher" qui y pousse donne des fruits qui confèrent des pouvoirs spéciaux à ceux qui les mangent, donnant à l'humanité une chance de se battre, mais cela ne fonctionne que pour les femmes. Ainsi, en tant que protectrices de l'humanité, les femmes gagnent en statut social tandis que les hommes sont relégués à des citoyens de seconde zone qui se battent pour une occupation et une reconnaissance de base.  
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, une lycéenne rusée et laborieuse dont la sœur aînée a été enlevée lors d'un événement du Mato 5 ans auparavant ; alors qu'elle se lamente sur les difficultés de la vie qui l'attend, un événement s'ouvre devant elle, et alors qu'elle est sauvée des démons par le capitaine Kyouka du Corps Anti-Démon, elle lui confère ses pouvoirs d'"esclave" et le transforme en un puissant monticule animal qui fauche les démons.  
  
Cependant, il y a un prix surprenant à payer pour être son "esclave"… et ce n'est pas lui qui doit le payer.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/takemura4hey/)
description.ru:
Эта боевая фентезийная манга повествует о нескольких героинях, что защищают людей в альтернативном пространстве, именуемом Мато (Город Демонов).  


---
description.vi:
Chiều không gian đầy quỷ dữ được gọi là "Ma đô" đã mở ra đe dọa đối với loài người. Tại đó, có một loài  "đào" ban cho kẻ ăn sức mạnh đặc biệt, giúp nhân loại có cơ hội chiến đấu, tuy nhiên, chỉ có nữ giới mới có thể sử dụng thứ sức mạnh "trái đào" ấy. Bởi vậy mà phụ nữ trở thành những người bảo vệ loài người, địa vị xã hội tăng cao, trong khi nam giới bị giáng xuống tầng lớp công dân hạng hai, giành giật nhau những công việc cơ bản và sự thừa nhận.

Nhân vật chính Yuuki Wakura, một nam sinh chăm chỉ yêu nội trợ, chị gái cậu đã bị bắt trong một sự kiện của Ma đô 5 năm về trước. Khi đang than thở về những khó khăn gặp phải, cậu đã bị lũ quỷ tấn công. Nhờ được đội trưởng Kyouka của Đội chống Quỷ kịp thời ứng cứu, cậu chấp nhận trở thành "nô lệ" của cô để có thể sở hữu sức mạnh tiêu diệt bầy quỷ.

Bất ngờ thay, việc làm "nô lệ" đòi hỏi một cái giá tương xứng...và người phải trả giá lại không phải là cậu.
description.pt-br:
A dimensão cheia de demônios conhecida como "Mato" se abriu para ameaçar a humanidade, e uma espécie de "pessegueiro" que ali cresce produz frutos que conferem poderes especiais a quem os come, dando à humanidade uma chance de lutar, mas isso só funciona para mulheres. Como tal, como protetoras da humanidade, as mulheres ascendem no estatuto social, enquanto os homens são relegados a cidadãos de segunda classe, em busca de uma ocupação básica e de reconhecimento.

 Yuuki Wakura é um estudante do último ano do ensino médio, astuto e trabalhoso, cuja irmã mais velha foi raptada durante um evento em Mato, 5 anos antes; enquanto lamenta as dificuldades da vida que tem pela frente, um evento se abre diante dele, e ao ser resgatado dos demônios pela Capitã Kyouka do Corpo Anti-Demônio, ela confere a ele poderes como seu "escravo" e o transforma em uma poderosa montaria bestial. que destrói os demônios.

No entanto, há um preço surpreendente a pagar por ele ser seu “escravo”… e não é ele quem tem que pagar.

To create a paradise where humans and demons can coexist, a human and a demon strive in order to fulfill that dream. This is their story.

人間と妖怪が仲良く暮らせる桃源郷を作る…その夢を叶える為に奔走する妖怪と人間の物語

인간과 요괴 사이 좋게 살 수있는 무릉도원이 있을까? ... 그 꿈을 이루기 위해 동분서주하는 요괴와 인간의 이야기

---
- [Official Korean Translation](https://www.comico.kr/comic/38)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.comico.in.th/titles/85)
description.th:
เรื่องราวของปิศาจและมนุษย์ผู้มุ่งมั่นทำความฝันในการสร้างดินแดนที่มนุษย์กับปิศาจจะอยู่ร่วมกันได้

---
- [Official Korean Translation](https://www.comico.kr/comic/38)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.comico.in.th/titles/85)
description.es-la: Para crear un paraíso donde humanos y yokai puedan coexistir, un humano y un yokai luchan para realizar ese sueño. Esta es su historia.

title.en: I Became a First-Class Guide Thanks to My Childhood Friends

altTitles.zh: 靠发小我变身顶级向导

description.en: [The twin brothers love me too much. What should I do?] D-class guide Qiao Yang, because of a drunken accident, discovered that he could use the two A-class sentinels, his childhood friends Zheng Jia and Zheng Yan, to enhance his own class. In order to retain this rare S-class status, he chose to conceal his exploitation of them. However, during the repeated interaction with the two, he gradually becomes aware of their feelings towards him...

altTitles.en: The Wizard and His Dear Fairy

altTitles.ja: 霧籠姫と魔法使い

altTitles.en: The Magician and the Princess of the Mist Cage

description.en: Deep in the forest, in a tower shrouded in mist, there lives a reclusive wizard by the name of Nebelhaut. When he happens across a beautiful fairy who's being held captive and made a public spectacle, he knows he has to take her with him. He names the creature Sti and orders her to call him his master, but her heart remains closed to him. But as time goes on, she sees a different side of him?a side that's both caring and awkward. The distance between the eccentric wizard and strong-willed fairy grows shorter day by day!

title.en: Belle Puppée’s Engagement - The Doll Princess and the Smitten Prince

altTitles.ja: ベル・プペーのスパダリ婚約～「好みじゃない」と言われた人形姫、我慢をやめたら皇子がデレデレになった。実に愛い！

description.en:
【“If I’m going to be abandoned anyway, I’ll allow myself to act freely one last time” – A ‘reverse-overindulgence’ love story presented by Selen!】
Leticia, the duke’s daughter nicknamed “The Beautiful Doll (ベル・プペー),” possesses a delicate appearance. However, her true nature combines courage and compassion, making her an exceptional person. She is arranged to be engaged to the second prince, Gilbert, who is rumored to have a difficult and improper character.
A flawless and perfect duke’s daughter and a lonely, clumsy prince cursed with red eyes. A destined pair who support and love each other in a unique “reverse-overindulgence” love story.
※ This product is a serialized version, dividing the chapters of the original work “The Spadari Engagement of Belle Poupee ~The Doll Princess Who Was Told ‘I Don’t Like You,’ Stopped Enduring, and Made the Prince Head Over Heels. Truly Adorable!” into individual parts.

altTitles.ja: 委員長とM子の百合

altTitles.en: Yuri Between the Class President and a Masochistic Girl
Class President's and Masochism Girl's Yuri

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女CLANCLANK

description.en: A 4 page shot about girls reading manga at the beach.

altTitles.ja: 九龍通学路

description.en:
A silent manga of a high school girl in Kowloon running on her way to school.

A girl overslept, and is now in a hurry. Will she be able to come to school on time?

(Source: BOOTH)

---

* Alternative Official Raw - [BOOTH](https://ibsukionsen.booth.pm/items/5285886)
description.ja:
九龍通学路を駆け回る女子高生の漫画風イラスト集。
寝坊して焦る彼女は遅刻せずに登校することが出来るのか?!

title.en: Me Being Searched at the Airport Security Check

altTitles.ja: 空港の手荷物検査で調べられちゃうボク

altTitles.ja-ro: Kuukou no Tenimotsu Kensa de Shiraberarechau Boku

description.en: A short full color story about a young couple imagining their holidays.

title.en: Watashi to Kanojo no Kawaii Koi no Hajime Kata

altTitles.en: How My Cute Girlfriend and I Started a Love Story

altTitles.ja: 私と彼女のかわいい恋のはじめ方

title.en: Tales of Crestoria: Togabito no Zaika

altTitles.ja: テイルズ・オブ・クレストリア　咎我人の罪歌

description.ja: 貧しいながらも明るい片田舎のダーチア村。正義感溢れる少年・カナタは、村のために飛び回る父の背中を追い、幼なじみのミゼラたちと共に村の役に立とうと奮闘していた。だが行商から父が還った夜、少年の世界は一変する。父はミゼラら孤児たちを引き取る一方、彼らを富裕層に売っていたのだ。動揺するカナタはミゼラを守るため、父を刺し殺してしまう。事件を知った村人たちの"正義"の祈りは、悪人を裁く"執行者"を呼ぶ。圧倒的な力を振るう執行者。追い詰められながらも再び顔を上げた時、少年は血塗られた奇跡をその手に掴む――。

title.en: Fist of the Blue Sky: Regenesis

altTitles.ja: 蒼天の拳 RE:GENESIS
蒼天の拳 リジェネシス

description.en: The year is 1939 and the world is plunged into chaos during the onslaught of WWII. After completing the initiation ritual, the 62nd Successor of Hokuto Shinken, Kasumi Kenshiro, is called upon by the destiny of Hokuto. He embarks on a new journey to the Dutch East Indies (Indonesia) which is crawling with the Dutch Army along with an anonymous user who wields a mysterious fist!

altTitles.en: Leaves of the Deep Blue Tree

altTitles.ja: コンノキコノハ

description.en: Only in autumn when the dead leaves flutter about can Akino meet the mysterious boy who lives inside the deep blue tree.

altTitles.ja: ジュカイ―承認欲求の森―

description.en:
Freelance writer Shunsuke Koshiji went to the Sea of Trees at the foot of Mount Fuji in response to a video streamer's message for help. Upon arrival, he found dozens of other streamers gathered there, their goal being to find a secret cult known as "Jofuku Divine Teaching," who are said to operate in the forest. But that night, something happens...

The Sea of Trees and a dark cult... both will bring out the streamers' ugly true desire of wanting to go viral...

(Source: Nihon Bungeisha)
description.ja:
富士の樹海に潜むとされるカルト教団「徐福神霊教」。
その実態を暴くべく、樹海へと足を踏み入れた動画配信者たちだが…。
自己顕示欲に塗れた彼らを玩ぶように、
死と恐怖が、鬱蒼と茂る樹海で拡散する―。
衝撃の承認欲求サスペンス!!

title.en: Ponkotsu Fuukiiin to Skaato take ga Futekisetsu na JK no Hanashi

altTitles.ja: ポンコツ風紀委員とスカート丈が不適切なＪＫの話

altTitles.en: The Story Between a Dumb Prefect and a High School Girl with an Inappropriate Skirt Length
Story of the Useless Prefect and the High School Girl with an Inappropriate Skirt Length

altTitles.zh: 根筋的風紀委員與裙長不當的JK

altTitles.id: Kisah Antara Komite Lugu dan Gadis SMA dengan Rok yang Terlalu Pendek

altTitles.pt-br: A História Entre um Monitor Burro e uma Colegial com a Saia em um Cumprimento Inadequado

altTitles.vi: Câu chuyện về cậu ủy viên ngốc nghếch và cô bạn gái có độ dài váy quá ngắn

description.en: Sakuradaimon is the school's prefect. A prefect is a student who is authorized to enforce discipline. As a prefect, he's supposed to be a role model to other students, but unfortunately he's not perfect. Kohinata is one of the people who Sakuradaimon has tried to discipline into wearing appropriate school attire, but she has thus far been disobedient.
description.ja: 度が過ぎるほど“マジメ”な風紀委員・桜大門くんの日々の役目は、校門当番として生徒たちの服装をチェックすること。彼がいつも注意するのは、髪の毛が明るくミニスカートな“問題児”小日向さん。口うるさい桜大門くんを嫌がる彼女だったが、彼が実はかなりの“ポンコツ”であることを知ってしまい…！？
description.pt-br: Sakuradaimon é o monitor do colégio; um monitor é um aluno que é pode aplicar atos disciplinatórios. Como monitor ele deve ser um aluno modelo para os outros estudantes, mas infelizmente ele não é perfeito. Kohinata é uma das estudantes que o Sakuradaimon tenta disciplinar devido ao uso incorreto do uniforme escolar, mas até o presente momento ela foi desobediente. Esta é a história entre a interação entre os dois.

title.ja: Silent Witch Chinmoku no Majo no Kakushigoto

altTitles.ja: サイレント・ウィッチ 沈黙の魔女の隠しごと

description.en:
Monica Everett is revered as “The Silent Witch.” She’s the only magician in the world who can use magic without an incantation... In reality though, she’s just shy— the only reason she practiced chantless magic was so that she wouldn't have to speak in public! Before even realizing her own talent, Monica is chosen as one of the “Seven Sages,” and is assigned the secret mission of protecting the kingdom’s second prince...?

The antisocial young prodigy will have to hide her true nature while secretly rescuing the prince from encroaching danger in this thrilling fantasy story!
description.es:
Monica Everett es venerada como «La Bruja Silenciosa». Es la única maga del mundo que puede usar la magia sin conjuros... En realidad, es tímida: ¡la única razón por la que practicaba magia sin encantamientos era para no tener que hablar en público! Antes incluso de darse cuenta de su propio talento, Mónica es elegida como uno de los «Siete Sabios», ¿y se le asigna la misión secreta de proteger al segundo príncipe del reino...?

La antisocial joven prodigio tendrá que ocultar su verdadera naturaleza mientras rescata en secreto al príncipe del peligro que la acecha en esta emocionante historia de fantasía.
description.id: Keajaiban tidak membutuhkan nyanyian. Ini adalah kisah tentang penyihir terlemah, paling pemalu, namun terkuat, dan bagaimana dia dilahirkan kembali, semuanya menjadi sebuah buku. (Penyihir Keheningan) Monica Everett. Satu-satunya penyihir di dunia yang bisa menggunakan sihir diam (tanpa nyanyian), dan seorang pahlawan muda yang membunuh sendiri naga hitam legendaris itu. Tapi apa sifat aslinya?? Alasan sebenarnya saya berlatih sihir diam adalah agar saya tidak perlu berbicara di depan umum. Ketika Monica terpilih sebagai salah satu dari 7 Watchers, tanpa disadari, dia terpaksa mengambil misi rahasia untuk melindungi pangeran kedua…? Lemah dan pemalu, namun yang terkuat. Penyihir surgawi yang antisosial menyembunyikan identitas aslinya dan diam-diam membawa kejahatan ke pengadilan melawan pangeran dalam fantasi yang menyakitkan! Fantasi penyihir web, terlahir kembali menjadi sebuah buku, dengan tambahan! Apa yang akan menjadi misteri baru yang berdiri di depan Monica Everett…?

altTitles.ja: アイツノカノジョ

altTitles.fr: La petite amie de ce mec

description.en: It's April of my third and final year in high school... But the beautiful girl I have a crush on is my best friend's girlfriend. Thus begins my year of treading on the dangerous ground...
description.ja:
気になるあの娘は、”親友の”彼女。

始まりの季節、春。主人公・リクの家を訪れた美少女・雫は「いいよ、何しても。」と、リクを誘う。しかし雫は、“親友（アイツ）の彼女”。
description.pt-br: É abril do meu terceiro e último ano no ensino médio... Mas a linda garota por quem tenho uma queda é a namorada do meu melhor amigo. Assim começa meu ano pisando em um terreno perigoso...

title.en: The Main Heroines Are Trying to Kill Me

altTitles.ja: 勇者ですが、ヒロインたちに命を狙われています

description.en:
Frey Raon Starlight was the hero who killed his family and comrades and destroyed the world. His goal was to return to the past, unlock a "hidden route" to truly save the world, and achieve peace.

As planned, he successfully returns to the past and gains access to the hidden route. However, his relief is short-lived as he is confronted with an unexpected truth: the five heroines he killed in his previous life have retained their memories and are now trying to kill him...!

Can Frey, under such extreme circumstances, save the world this time?

altTitles.ja: 色憑くモノクローム

description.en:
Isshiki falls in love with a maiden who is pure and innocent, but he has been possessed by Asmodeus, the demon of lust. The demon tries to arouse Isshiki by stimulating the sexual desires of the girls around him in every possible way. However, in order to exorcise the demon and avoid the girls' suspicions, Isshiki must never get excited, no matter how lewd they may act!

"How can I stand this...!"
description.ja: 純潔を貫く乙女に恋をした主人公・一色は、よりにもよって色欲の悪魔アスモデウスに憑りつかれてしまった。悪魔はあの手この手で乙女たちの性欲を刺激して一色を興奮させようとしてくる。しかし、乙女に嫌われないためにも悪魔を祓うためにも一色は絶対に興奮してはならない……たとえそれがどんなに淫らな行為だとしても！「こんなの我慢できるわけ……っ！」エロスとピュア、究極のせめぎ合いラブコメ開戦！

altTitles.ja: 十字架のろくにん

description.en:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

altTitles.en: Kimagure Orange Road - Digital Colored Comics

altTitles.ja: きまぐれオレンジ★ロード
きまぐれオレンジ☆ロード
きまぐれオレンジロード
きまぐれオレンジ★ロード カラー版

description.en: Secretly-psychic Kyosuke has just settled into a bustling school filled with brand-new faces, but he wastes no time making waves! With both the shy and mysterious Madoka and the high-energy Hikaru spinning in and out of his life, Kyosuke’s dizzy with the first sweet rush of female attention! But will his instincts lead him into the arms (and heart) of the right girl?

altTitles.ja: 放課後ギター

description.en: Psycho Pandas: A oneshot about two teens hiding who they are from the rest of society, one perceived as a genius and the other perceived as a delinquent, and how their true selves come together.

altTitles.th: รักใสๆ ของยอนอู

description.en:
Yeon Woo possesses such a delicate appearance that he could be mistaken as a female student. However, he has a secret crush on the school idol, Kang Haesol. But the shy and timid Yeon Woo has never said a word to her…

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5483716), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=752532)

description.ko:
여학생으로 오해받을 정도로 여리여리한 외모를 가진 연우. 
그는 교내 인기스타인 강해솔을 몰래 좋아하고 있다.
하지만 낯을 굉장히 많이 가리고 소심한 연우는 같은 반인 해솔이에게 말 한 번 붙여본 적 없는데…

description.th:
"ตอนนี้ผมกำลังแอบรักเธอข้างเดียว"

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5483716), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=752532)

description.zh:
纯情小白恋上高冷万人迷，
青涩的他能否勇敢追爱？
长相秀气，以至于经常被误认为是女孩子的延禹，正在暗恋同校的万人迷蒋晗抒。然而极其认生，性格怯懦的延禹还从未跟同班的晗抒说过话…在各种同学的助攻下，延禹能否鼓起勇气，勇敢追爱呢？

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5483716), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=752532)

* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romance/yeonwoo/list?title_no=2335&page=1)
description.pt-br: Yeonwoo possui uma aparência tão delicada que poderia ser confundido com uma aluna. No entanto, ele tem uma paixão secreta pelo ídolo da escola, Kang Haesol. Mas o tímido Yeonwoo nunca disse uma palavra a ela...

title.en: Kiyo in Kyoto: From the Maiko House

altTitles.ja: 舞妓さんちのまかないさん

altTitles.en: The Caterer at the Maiko Manor
The Makanai: Cooking for the Maiko House

description.en:
Within the winding streets of Kyoto's geisha district lives a 16 year old girl named Kiyo. 
After failing to become a Maiko, a traditional dance apprentice, she starts working as caterer for her troupe. 
This is the story of her daily life.  

Published in Indonesian by Elex Media as **Juru Masak Para Maiko**.

Anime: [AniDB](https://anidb.net/anime/15476) | [MAL](https://myanimelist.net/anime/41556/Maiko-san_Chi_no_Makanai-san) | [ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=23951) | [LC](https://www.livechart.me/anime/9863) | [IMDB](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt13884016/)
Live-action dorama: [Netflix](https://www.netflix.com/title/81325501) | [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/718203-kiyo-in-kyoto) | [IMDB](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt15964848/)
 
--- 
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen Manga**
description.ja: ここは京都のど真ん中にある花街。 舞妓さんたちが深夜、お仕事を終えたあと帰ってきて、共同生活を送っているのは、「屋形」と呼ばれるおうちです。 とある屋形で「まかないさん」として舞妓さんたちに毎日の食事を作っているのは、なんと弱冠16歳の少女・キヨ。 彼女がまかないさんになったのには、ある意外な理由があって——。 華やかな花街の舞台裏、普通の日のごはんを通して、温かな人間模様が描かれます。

altTitles.ja: ミザントロープな彼女

description.en:
Hanami Matsudai is awkward when it comes to love and she doesn't know the proper distance for human relationships. You might as well call her a misanthrope. Her peaceful life is disturbed when she meets the unpredictable Ran Ojiya who just won't leave her alone!  
  
The slapstick love comedy of an aloof and love-hating loner girl and a love-crazed handsome stalker begins!

Since the old days, mystical creatures have existed to help humans. However, now that the times have changed, they suddenly receive a warning from their god: "Prove that you are still needed".

While grappling with how they can assist humans in the modern era, these creatures decide to send their younglings to the human world to seek answers.

Meanwhile, university student Park Geuru, who lives his miserable days commuting for five hours to school due to a sudden move, accidentally ends up making a bet with the goblin Sihan... 

This is a story about the daily life of these young mystical creatures, exploring the human world in order to avoid their own extinction.

title.en: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago

altTitles.zh: 我家老婆来自一千年前

altTitles.zh-ro: Wojia Laopo Laizi Yiqian Nian Qian
Wǒjiā Lǎopó Láizì Yīqiān Nián Qián

altTitles.vi: Vợ Tôi Từ Một Ngàn Năm Trước
Bà Xã Nhà Tôi Đến Từ Ngàn Năm Trước

altTitles.fr: Ma femme vient d'il y a 1000 ans

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.
